nodes.text: Galaxy of Heroes is an online flash player game found at The Clone Wars page on the Cartoon Network website.

The battle lines have been drawn! Rise to the challenge of The Clone Wars in Galaxy of Heroes. Command the battlefield as Anakin, Ahsoka, Yoda, Rex or Cad Bane! Fight on foot and unlock new vehicles. Pilot the AT-TE, AT-RT, Republic Gunship and the BARC Speeder, and master all 20 mini-games. Play Star Wars: The Clone Wars game for free on Cartoon Network!

The game is a shooter played from a top-down perspective. The player can choose one of the available characters to play on the level. After choosing the character, the level of difficulty must be chosen, either easy or hard. Each character can perform either a basic attack or a unique special attack.
